channel.title: Azazaya
channel.description: Personal Website of Kazi Abu Rousan

item.title: Physics Blogs
item.description: A short description of the page which would serve as blurb in a RSS feed; you can use basic markdown here but the whole description string must be a single line (not a multiline string). Like this one for instance. Keep in mind that styling is minimal in RSS so for instance don't expect maths or fancy styling to work; images should be ok though:

item.title: What exactly is Light Momentum?
item.description: IN this blog, we will understand What exactly is Light Momentum? and from where exactly it is coming?

item.title: Time Dilation as Coordinate Transformation
item.description: A visual understanding on how we can visualize Time Dilation as a simple result of coordinate transformation.
